mapper.sql: select patients.id, patients.name, patients.gender, patients.birthday, id_number, phone, address, patients.create_time as createTime, registrations.doctor_id, doctors.name as doctorName, departments.id as departmentId, departments.name as department, patients.update_time as updateTime, registrations.state from patients inner join doctors inner join departments inner join registrations on departments.id = registrations.department_id and doctors.id = registrations.doctor_id and patients.id = registrations.patient_id
mapper.insert: insert into patients (name, gender, birthday, id_number, phone, address, create_time) values (#{name},#{gender}, #{birthday}, #{idNumber}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update patients
name=#{name},
patients.gender=#{gender},
birthday=#{birthday},
address=#{address},
id_number=#{idNumber},
phone=#{phone},
create_time=#{createTime}
where patients.id = #{id}
